info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 1:28PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fulton, west central Saratoga and east central Montgomery Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 127 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Galway, or 8 miles northeast of Amsterdam, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hagaman, Beyers Corners, Hoeseville, Bunn Corners, Steele Corners, Hagedorns Mills, Honeywell Corners, Stairs Corners, North Galway, Mills Corners, Skinner Corners, Green Corners, Blue Corners, West Galway, Whiteside Corners, Fairweather Corners and Cummings Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
